post.description: Create and shedule SMS Campaign for contact lists

message.description: SMS message that needs to be sent.

includeLists.description:
You can send the message to multiple lists in an array.
The message can be sent to contacts in the lists

excludeLists.description: Exclude contacts from the specified lists in this parameter.

senderName.description: The ID will be displayed in the recipient's phone as the sender.

campaignName.description: The campaign name that will appear in your reports.

scheduleSend.description: Date and time on which the messages will be sent.

get.summary: Get status of campaign by campaignId

post.description:
Create or update list of contacts.
Max number of contacts per request: 5000 contacts.
Returns current consents this user has with last update date for subscribe or unsubscribe.

Returns list of contacts page with last index id.
Max. number of contacts per request - 1000 contacts.

Returns list of unsubscribed contacts page with last index id.
Max. number of contacts per request - 1000 contacts.

Unsubscribe one or more contacts from SMS/Email or both.
Phone or Email are required.
Send SMS via Weezmo, using target and SMS content.

target.description: Phone number

senderName.description: 3-11 English chars. If sender name is empty, take default business sender name from API key

AttachedFiles.description:
File type: The following file formats are supported: .jpeg, .jpg, .png, .gif, .bmp, .tiff, .tif, .webp, .svg, .doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx, .pdf, .txt, .rtf, .csv
File size: Each file can be a maximum of 5MB.The total size of all attached files must not exceed 25MB.
